name: Project Savior: Prologue
description:
12/6/17: New HTML5 version! May have extra bugs, so download the Windows version if possible. Only confirmed to work on Chrome.

The world is ending. Made for GitHub Game Off 2017.

Music by Daydream Anatomy: https://daydreamanatomy.bandcamp.com

Note: Many sound effects are missing and may be added in a post-jam build. Thanks for playing, and please report any bugs you find!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

Z in air - Switch to ship mode (uses fuel)

X - Shoot (grounded or ship mode only)
